member.name: FILE_ID_INFO
member.summary: Contains identification information for a file. This structure is returned from the function whenFileIdInfo is passed in the FileInformationClassparameter.

member.name: FILE_ID_INFO.VolumeSerialNumber
member.summary: The serial number of the volume that contains a file.

member.name: FILE_ID_INFO.FileId
member.summary: The 128-bit file identifier for the file. The file identifier and the volume serial number uniquely identify a file on a single computer. To determine whether two open handles represent the same file, combine the identifier and the volume serial number for each file and compare them.
